bundle.name: OpenVPN-ALS Tunnels
bundle.description: This extension adds the 'Tunnels' feature to OpenVPN-ALS. Tunnels allow an administrator to create secure tunnels.

extension.name: OpenVPN-ALS Tunnels
extension.description: This extension adds the 'Tunnels' feature to OpenVPN-ALS. Tunnels allow an administrator to create secure tunnels.
